Description.Text: Facilities A baggage storage service, a cash machine, a restaurant and a bar are available to guests of the hotel. Wireless internet access is available to travellers in the public areas. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning and a bathroom. A double bed ensures a good night's sleep. There is also a minibar. Guests will also find a fridge included as standard. Internet access, a telephone, a TV and WiFi add to the comfort of the holiday. Amenities in the bathrooms include a shower. A hairdryer is also available. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers a selection of sport and leisure opportunities. A refreshing dip in the swimming pool is a great way to cool off on hot days. Guests can enjoy a range of refreshing drinks at the poolside bar. The accommodation offers massage treatments (for a fee) to travellers. Entertainment facilities include a nightclub. Meals Breakfast can be booked.
